title: Cornelis Viruly
text:
Cornelis Marius Viruly (11 November 1875 – 23 September 1938) was a Dutch <a href="Shooting%20sports">sport shooter</a> who competed in the <a href="1908%20Summer%20Olympics">1908 Summer Olympics</a>.
He was born in <a href="Vuren">Vuren</a> and died in <a href="Amsterdam">Amsterdam</a>.
In 1908 he finished fourth with the Dutch team in the <a href="Shooting%20at%20the%201908%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20team%20trap%20shooting">team trap shooting event</a>. In the <a href="Shooting%20at%20the%201908%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20individual%20trap%20shooting">individual trap competition</a> he finished 14th.
